addr: Foyles 6F event space, 107 Charing Cross Road, London WC2H 0DT  GB
title: Wattpad LondonCon 2015
desc: - Wattpad's most successful authors tell you how to do it - Gav the Orangutan answers your questions - Why we love it, and how we can all use its tricks to become better writers - Wattpad's trad-pubbed authors tell you how they did it - and what you can do - Industry insiders give the lowdown on routes to publishing, and Wattpadders share their experiences  The event runs 1:30-5pm in the beautiful event space on the 6th floor of Foyles in central London. Make a day of it and finish your Christmas shopping - with books! Tickets are FREE, but must be booked here. Looking forward to seeing you! Any questions, message @JayVictor on Wattpad or tweet @DrVictoriaJames
